name: Edvard Sills' adventures
description:
You play Edvard Sills, a real historical person. He was the son of a Norwegian judge and a female slave in the Danish-Norwegian colony of St. Croix in the Caribbean. 10 years old he survived a dramatic shipwreck in the Oslofjord. He ended up staying with his aunt in Christiania (Oslo), Mrs. Bull.

NB: This game is currently only in Norwegian. 
NB 2: This is a demo and may still contain some bugs and hiccups.
